post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Job Profile  
Advertisement number: 296789
Title: Data entry operator (data entry,) (NOC: 1422)  
Terms of Employment: Temporary, Full Time, Day
Salary: $8.00 Hourly for 40 hours per week
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (2 vacancies)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Some college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Other: must have high speed with numeric key pad.
Experience: 0 - 6 months
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Technical Terminology: Computer-data processing terminology
Typing (Words Per Minute): 61 - 80 wpm
Type of Data Entry: Alpha-numeric

Employer: softcom

How to Apply:  By E-mail: cesar12@sympatico.ca

Business Profile: computer services and marketing and communications
Advertised until: 2003/04/30
post.title: Data entry operator (data entry,)
